name: RFL_PROV_NAME
description: Stores information about the referring provider(s) sent by an outside organization.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFL_PROV_NAME
columns.description: Stores the names of referring providers as received via Care Everywhere.
